name: Imaginate Teen
description: An afterschool creative community where you can try different art forms, express yourself, and make new friends. This program is all about choice—students decide how often they attend (1, 2, or all 3 days per week) and what kind of art they want to create. With experienced teaching artists guiding the way, teens will have the freedom to experiment, collaborate, and develop their own artistic voice.

address: One Arkansas Street (at 16th Street), San Francisco, CA, 94107
